multisampler.name: Multisampler
multisampler.description:
This plugin implements multi-instrument MIDI sample player with stereo input
and stereo output. For each instrument there are up to eight samples available
to play for different note velocities. Also each instrument has it's own stereo
output that makes possible to record instrument outputs into individual tracks.

sampler.name: Sampler
sampler.description:
This plugin implements single-note MIDI sample player with input and output.
There are up to eight samples available to play for different note velocities.
